page.title: 16Opinion, Peace, Social
page.content: {Adbaston} 3 problems concern people:- World peace, their children's future, and economic and social problems. Most residents mention peace. They dislike the existence of atomic bombs, agree that they have been a deterrent, but believe that multilateral disarmament is necessary. Some fear the bomb being in irresponsible hands. Parents hope their children will be happy and employed. Economic and social problems which worry peope are unemployment; the future of the welfare state; lack of discipline and drug problems among youth; increase in crimes of violence; child abuse; racial problems; pollution of the environment. Some do not think about the future. Rural peace appeals to residents.
